text:
When the City receives a claim alleging improper conduct by a police officer, other than a claim seeking only damages for damage to property resulting from the operation of a Police Department vehicle, the City Attorney shall send the claimant a notice that describes the OCC's role in investigating complaints of police officer misconduct, and includes information on how to contact the OCC. 
(Added by Ord. 244-03, File No. 031401, App. 10/17/2003)

heading.catch_text: NOTIFICATION TO CLAIMANTS IN POLICE MATTERS.

chapter.text: COORDINATION BETWEEN THE POLICE DEPARTMENT AND THE OFFICE OF CITIZEN COMPLAINTS
